trans-unit.source: Write a great app description
trans-unit.target: Write a great app description

trans-unit.target: Write a great app description

trans-unit.source: A great description can make your app stand out in the Windows Store and help encourage customers to download it.
trans-unit.target: A great description can make your app stand out in the Windows Store and help encourage customers to download it.

trans-unit.source: [The description you enter when submitting your app](create-app-descriptions.md) is displayed in your app's Store listing.
trans-unit.target: [The description you enter when submitting your app](create-app-descriptions.md) is displayed in your app's Store listing.

trans-unit.source: The first few lines may also be displayed in search results and algorithm lists in the Store.
trans-unit.target: The first few lines may also be displayed in search results and algorithm lists in the Store.

trans-unit.source: Here are some tips for making your app's description the best it can be.
trans-unit.target: Here are some tips for making your app's description the best it can be.

trans-unit.source: Grab attention in the first few sentences.
trans-unit.target: Grab attention in the first few sentences.

trans-unit.source: The beginning of your description is the most important, so make sure it grabs and holds attention.
trans-unit.target: The beginning of your description is the most important, so make sure it grabs and holds attention.

trans-unit.source: Think about what you can say in one or two sentences to explain your app's unique appeal and make someone decide they want it.
trans-unit.target: Think about what you can say in one or two sentences to explain your app's unique appeal and make someone decide they want it.

trans-unit.source: Make it easy to learn about your app.
trans-unit.target: Make it easy to learn about your app.

trans-unit.source: After your initial hook, describe additional benefits, in-app purchase opportunities, and other details about your app that customers will want to know.
trans-unit.target: After your initial hook, describe additional benefits, in-app purchase opportunities, and other details about your app that customers will want to know.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you include any disclosures or information that you are required to provide under the law in the markets where you are distributing your app.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you include any disclosures or information that you are required to provide under the law in the markets where you are distributing your app.

trans-unit.source: Use lists and short paragraphs.
trans-unit.target: Use lists and short paragraphs.

trans-unit.source: Potential customers may just take a quick glance at your app's description.
trans-unit.target: Potential customers may just take a quick glance at your app's description.

trans-unit.source: Breaking up the content by using short paragraphs and lists makes it easier to scan.
trans-unit.target: Breaking up the content by using short paragraphs and lists makes it easier to scan.

trans-unit.source: **Note** Adding a list of [app features](create-app-descriptions.md#app-features) can also help to quickly show what your app does.
trans-unit.target: **Note** Adding a list of [app features](create-app-descriptions.md#app-features) can also help to quickly show what your app does.

trans-unit.source: This list appears directly below the app description.
trans-unit.target: This list appears directly below the app description.

trans-unit.source: Avoid dry language.
trans-unit.target: Avoid dry language.

trans-unit.source: Write your description using engaging language.
trans-unit.target: Write your description using engaging language.

trans-unit.source: Be sure the wording clearly describes what your app does, but say it in a way that doesn't sound boring.
trans-unit.target: Be sure the wording clearly describes what your app does, but say it in a way that doesn't sound boring.

trans-unit.source: For many apps, a casual and friendly tone works well.
trans-unit.target: For many apps, a casual and friendly tone works well.

trans-unit.source: Use a length that is just right.
trans-unit.target: Use a length that is just right.

trans-unit.source: A good description reads quickly, but also includes enough info to get the reader interested and explain what the app does.
trans-unit.target: A good description reads quickly, but also includes enough info to get the reader interested and explain what the app does.

trans-unit.source: A complex app will need more sentences to describe it; a simple app may need only a few.
trans-unit.target: A complex app will need more sentences to describe it; a simple app may need only a few.

trans-unit.source: In most cases the right length is somewhere over 200 words, but well under 3000.
trans-unit.target: In most cases the right length is somewhere over 200 words, but well under 3000.

trans-unit.source: Be clear about free trials and in-app products.
trans-unit.target: Be clear about free trials and in-app products.

trans-unit.source: If you offer a free trial of your app, be sure to explain how that trial works, so that customers understand which features are limited.
trans-unit.target: If you offer a free trial of your app, be sure to explain how that trial works, so that customers understand which features are limited.

trans-unit.source: It's also a good idea to mention what types of in-app products are available, particularly if they have significant impacts on your app's functionality.
trans-unit.target: It's also a good idea to mention what types of in-app products are available, particularly if they have significant impacts on your app's functionality.

trans-unit.source: Use standard capitalization and punctuation.
trans-unit.target: Use standard capitalization and punctuation.

trans-unit.source: Descriptions in all caps, or those that have unusual punctuation, can be hard to read.
trans-unit.target: Descriptions in all caps, or those that have unusual punctuation, can be hard to read.

trans-unit.source: Don't forget to check the spelling and grammar.
trans-unit.target: Don't forget to check the spelling and grammar.

trans-unit.source: A description with lots of misspelled words or mangled sentences doesn't reflect well on the quality of your app.
trans-unit.target: A description with lots of misspelled words or mangled sentences doesn't reflect well on the quality of your app.

trans-unit.source: Be sure to review your description (or have someone else take a look) to check for errors.
trans-unit.target: Be sure to review your description (or have someone else take a look) to check for errors.

trans-unit.source: Don't include links or info that belongs elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: Don't include links or info that belongs elsewhere.

trans-unit.source: URLs that you enter in the description field won't be clickable, so don't try to add links for things like your privacy policy or support website.
trans-unit.target: URLs that you enter in the description field won't be clickable, so don't try to add links for things like your privacy policy or support website.

trans-unit.source: Instead, add these in the designated areas of the **App description** page.
trans-unit.target: Instead, add these in the designated areas of the **App description** page.

trans-unit.source: Don't try to use HTML tags.
trans-unit.target: Don't try to use HTML tags.

trans-unit.source: HTML or other code will not be rendered.
trans-unit.target: HTML or other code will not be rendered.

trans-unit.source: Your description needs to be plain text only.
trans-unit.target: Your description needs to be plain text only.

trans-unit.source: Get ideas by reviewing descriptions of similar apps in the Store.
trans-unit.target: Get ideas by reviewing descriptions of similar apps in the Store.

trans-unit.source: Take a look at how other developers describe their apps.
trans-unit.target: Take a look at how other developers describe their apps.

trans-unit.source: This also helps you figure out what you can emphasize that is different about your app.
trans-unit.target: This also helps you figure out what you can emphasize that is different about your app.
